title: 1 Million mastery points on Ekko (rito time to implement rewards)
body:
Just hit 1 million mastery points on ekko, I believe the community has been asking for 1 million mastery points rewards for a while and now that the mvp (me) has hit 1 million it's time we implement said rewards.

for such a huge time investment and accomplishment it's quite ridiculous to have no rewards, it could be something so simple as adding a "1 million club icon"

potential suggestions:

1 million point Icon

New champion mastery emote (think lvl 7 except super overdone and flashy)

Golden aura around champion regardless of skin (optional)

1 million mastery point skins (could be purchasable only unlocked after achieving 1 million points on a champion) (pretty bs to be purchasable but also pretty bs to except rito to make a skin for every champ and be free)

1 million emote

1 million ward

Mini tft version of champion
